author: Jordan McMahon
title: The App Aloe Bud Wants You to Treat Self Care Like a Garden
description: In challenging times, regular reminders to take care of yourself can be a big help to your mental health.
content: Amber Disckos descent into a state of emotional turmoil started as a slow trickle. It began around the time Donald Trump won the presidential election in November 2016 and when Disckos social media and voter registration work for the Hillary Clinton campaign … [+3470 chars]
